Name: Indian Chicken Curry
Steps: chop chicken breast and sprinkle with 2 teaspoons
stir in curry powder, cumin, turmeric, coriander, cayenne and 1 tablespoon of water, heat together for about 1 minute whilestirring
Mix into mixture the tomatoes, yoghurt , chopped cilantro (tbs), and salt (1tsp)
pour 1/2 cup of water in mixture, bring to a boil, turn chicken to coat with sauce
sprinkle garam masala and 1 tbs cilantro over the chicken
simmer until chicken is done (20 minutes for full chicken breast
Notes: 2020-04-01 added too much ginger, and didn't have coriander. Was a little too soapy, not enough kick?, add peas? and with coriander should be good. Easy on the ginger next time
